com.oryzone.mvdetector.differenceStrategy
Interface IDifferenceStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDifferenceStrategy, GreyscaleDifferenceStrategy, RgbDifferenceStrategy
public interface IDifferenceStrategy

Interface that defines the methods of the difference strategy classes. Difference strategy classes are class that should provide a methods to calculate the difference between two image of the same size, and also provide numerical values to represent the amount of difference.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Luciano Mammino, Andrea Mangano
See Also:
AbstractDifferenceStrategy

Method Detail

calculateDifference

int calculateDifference(com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage prevImage,
                        com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage currImage)
Calculates the difference between the previous and the current image

Parameters:
prevImage - the previous image
currImage - the current image
Returns:
a integer that represents the amount of difference between the two images

getDifferenceAmount

int getDifferenceAmount()
Gets the amount of difference between the previous and current images. This value is generally calculated after a call to calculateDifference(com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage, com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage).

Returns:
an integer representing the amount of difference

getDifferencePercent

float getDifferencePercent()
Gets the percent of difference between the previous and current images. This value is generally calculated after a call to calculateDifference(com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage, com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage).

Returns:
an float representing the percent of difference

getDifferenceImage

com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage getDifferenceImage()
Gets an image that graphically represents the difference between the previous and the current image. This value is generally calculated after a call to calculateDifference(com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage, com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage).

Returns:
an image that graphically represents the difference between the previous and the current image
